mapper.select: select name from user where name=#{name};

SELECT distinct u.* FROM `user` u LEFT JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permession rp ON rp.role_id=r.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.p_id=rp.p_id WHERE u.`name`=#{name} AND u.`password`=#{password}

SELECT DISTINCT permission.p_id z1id,permission.p_name z1name,permission.parent_id z1pid,permission.path z1path, pe.p_id peid,pe.p_name pename,pe.parent_id pepid,pe.path pepath from (SELECT p.* from role_permession rp left join permission p on rp.p_id = p.p_id where rp.role_id=#{id}) as permission LEFT JOIN permission pe on permission.p_id=pe.parent_id ORDER BY permission.p_id
